text: Munhu yoyose yali na nhunza ya kupeta, kolondigwa yaupete Usenga wa Mulungu. Munhu yoyose yowataza wanhu wayagwe, kolondigwa yawataze na mhiko ziyagweleligwe na Mulungu, giladi mzimbuli zose nhogolwa yagweleligwe Mulungu kubitila Yesu Kilisto. Yenzi na mhiko viwe kumwake gunge na gunge. Amina.
